author: admin
title: Global Fingerprint Biometrics Market 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 2:01 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About fingerprint biometrics 
Biometrics performs verification and identification processes to authenticate an individual. In a verification process, a one-to-one matching method is used to verify the biometrics traits of an individual against a particular template in a database, whereas in an identification process, a one-to-many matching method is used wherein the biometrics traits of an individual is matched against all templates in the database to determine an individual's identity.Fingerprint biometric technology matches the fingerprint scan of an individual with the database to identify and verify an individual based on features such as arch, whorl, and loop. Pattern-based algorithms are used to match an individual's fingerprint against the database. With advances in technology, AFIS was introduced in 1986, which is being used by a number of law enforcement agencies to identify a criminal. Technavio's analysts forecast the global fingerprint biometrics market to grow at a CAGR of 22.45% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this report This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global fingerprint biometrics market for 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the sales of fingerprint biometric solutions. These include sensor, scanner, reader, fingerprint analysis software, and database. The report includes revenues generated from hardware, software, and integrated solutions. Revenues generated from aftersales services are not included to calculate the market size.The report provides a detailed analysis of the following:- End-users: government sector, transit sector, healthcare sector, BFSI sector, and retail- Geographies: North America, APAC, Europe, Latin America, and MEATechnavio's report, Global Fingerprint Biometrics Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market. Key regions
